skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A Witch Hunter is a stern, grim figure, that can rarely be rattled despite the horrors he faces.
The Witch Hunter levels his finger across the battlefield and accuses one of the enemy of arch-heresy!

The role of Witch-Finder General is the highest attainable office within the practices of legally authorised and sanctioned witch hunters operating openly in the Empire. Bearing such a writ gives a witch hunter leave to investigate the taint of Chaos anywhere within the Empire and act upon it should he find it.
The Witch Hunter keeps many blessed relics on his person to protect him against arcane attack.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: +2% for all enemy spells
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: When attacking larger abominations, the Witch Hunter has the accoutrements to bring such beasts down.
Silent, swift and very, very deadly, this one can take down the foe from range without breaking a sweat or revealing his position.
Through the skin to kill the soul.
Only the foolish go on the hunt without supplies and a cast-iron plan.
Such advanced ballistic skills tend to rub off on one's subordinates.

ui_effects.localised_text: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
"I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Requires line of sight to the target

items.colour_text: A reward from the White Order of Templehof, who see Von Korden as a powerful force for good that can drive back the creatures of darkness.

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to "Focused Shot" and "Von Korden's Accusation"

ui_effects.localised_text: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Alberich von Korden is a Witch Hunter who is feared as well as respected in settlements across the Vale of Darkness.

effects.description:
Enables flaming attacks when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(all units in army)
Attribute: Unbreakable when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
